Unlike alternatives that may fail with special characters or complex strings, this proven endpoint https://qrcodegenerator-47jz.onrender.com/qrcode/download/{text} handles all text formats flawlessly and returns perfect QR codes every time. Simply replace {text} with your content for instant, dependable results.
